channel.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
channel.description:
New media since forum wipe.
![](upload://owP2MtXTHWNWe4a41H8LvTSyUgb.jpeg) For the 360, that's pretty fucking gorgeous.... [img]https://img.gawkerassets.com/img/17zqwo3lu8ryujpg/original.jpg[/img] OH JESUS HNNNG
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ctyrT11HT34']Covenant weapons reveled, sounds. Not Dubstep.[/url]
Sound design still fucking incredible with a decent system. I have a feeling this is going to be the main point of complaint from people who don't have any sub.

item.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
Just started reading Silentium a few days ago. It’s easily the best book of the Forerunner trilogy by far.

Plus we finally get to understand what Guilty Spark meant when he told Chief, “Last time you asked me, if it were my choice, would I do it?”

… only the makers of Halo would wait 12 years before explaining one of the most cryptic lines in the games…

Read full topic
item.source: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.

item.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
Pyro:

What exactly do these arches look like? I’m just sort of imaging something like a giant version of the gateway arch that extends into space, and maybe sets down in another dimension or something.

the ISO-didact (bornsteller) describes the Orbital Arches and Unbending Filaments on Charum Hakkor as “ivy growing on great trees”

they are also referred to as “star bridges” in the books

Read full topic

item.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
The arches are indestructable to all things (except the halos), and ancient humans build many cities along the arches (so it can be assumed that either they provided some atmosphere or the arches already have a atmosphere)

The Domain is a information network not located in normal space-time (presumabally slipspace?) that the forerunners use to archive all their history

The Flood revealed to the Librarian that the Domain was the long mythologized “Organon”, which is a precursor relic that had the power to control all other precursor tech

the Domain/Organon also happened to be a Precursor consciousness

and apparently, it survived the halo firings (as evidenced by the terminals in the games)

Read full topic

item.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Orbital arches? Sounds like the precursors made Stargates to me…

they arent portals, the Precursor Orbial Arches are physical arches that [color=red]LITERALLY CONNECT STAR SYSTEMS AND GALAXIES TOGETHER[/size]

the prehistoric Humans build cities on said arches (all destroyed during their war with flood/forerunners)

the arches themselves (and most other Precurosr technology) are suspectable to the Halo rings, so it is assumed they were destroyed after the Halo firing

item.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
Pyro:

So are the precursors and forerunners two different races, or…?

they are 2 different races

but the precursors are the reason forerunners, humans (and all life in the Milky Way) exist

the precursors’ technology is far superior to forerunners/prehistoric Humans
as they have a reach throughout the universe (some of their relics dont even exist in our space-time, the domain is a perfect example of this)

they are capable of making “orbital arches” that “connect” worlds and star systems together

and some of them turned themselves into powder that grew infectious and eventually became the flood (their powder forms were originally meant to allow them to be reborn in future times, had space diseases not tampered with it)

Read full topic

item.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
Major spoilers

Halo silentium is out and alot of things have been revealed

-Precursors went into hiding and/or turned themselves into powder that would grow themselves back into their former selves; but the said powder grew diseases through time and perpetuates the flood infection; flood = reincarnated precursors

-The Domain is actually a precursor Essence created by precursors that contains 100 billion years worth of history

-A precursor relic encountered in the Galaxy Large Magellanic Cloud (called Path Kethona by forerunners), has the power to “crush” and “shrink” a planet (this could very well appear in halo 5/6)

Read full topic

item.title: I guess I have to be the one to make the Halo 4 thread again.
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
bornstellder didact travelled across the universe according to the Silentium previews

while ur-didact survived his flood trap (presumabally during the time of that terminal where he rallys his mechanical/“COMPOSED” prometheans)

OR maybe ur-didact’s “execution” was actually at the hands of the Librarian (remeber the terminals?) but in reality he was just crippled and stored in a Cryptum for 100,000 years (until his re-awakening by john117)

its hard to tell, no realizing how much of the halo 4 terminals contradict the halo 3 terminals and Forerunner saga books

Read full topic
